throw a giant birthday cake with balloon.narration: The monster catches a giant cake while balloons and music fill the room!
throw a giant birthday cake with balloon.prompt_feedback: Amazing job! You included food, decorations, AND entertainment — that's a perfect party plan!

have a party with huge cake decorations.narration: A massive cake arrives as decorations sparkle and the monster dances!
have a party with huge cake decorations.prompt_feedback: You nailed it! Cake, decorations, and fun — the monster is having the best day ever!

give monster a big party with cake ballo.narration: The monster opens presents while cake and balloons surround it — party perfection!
give monster a big party with cake ballo.prompt_feedback: Excellent! You described exactly what the party needs — food, decorations, and presents!

throw a cake.narration: A cake flies through the air but the room feels pretty empty!
throw a cake.prompt_feedback: Good start with the cake! Try adding decorations like balloons and some fun activities to make it a real party.

have a party.narration: The monster shows up to an empty room and looks around confused!
have a party.prompt_feedback: The monster wants to party but doesn't know how! Be specific — what food, decorations, and activities should the party have?

give monster cake.narration: The monster gobbles up a cake but wishes there was more to the party!
give monster cake.prompt_feedback: The monster loves cake! Now try adding decorations and something fun to do — that's what makes a party a PARTY.

make monster happy.narration: The monster tries to smile but isn't sure what's happening!
make monster happy.prompt_feedback: The monster WANTS to be happy — help it out! Describe a party with cake, balloons, presents, and fun activities!

do something fun.narration: The monster spins around excitedly but there's nothing to do!
do something fun.prompt_feedback: Fun is great, but be more specific! What KIND of fun? Try describing a party with a giant cake, colorful balloons, and dancing!

party time.narration: The monster puts on a tiny party hat and waits for instructions!
party time.prompt_feedback: The monster is ready to party! But it needs your help — describe what food to serve, how to decorate, and what games to play!

throw the biggest most amazing cake ever.narration: A HUGE cake rockets across the room while confetti explodes everywhere!
throw the biggest most amazing cake ever.prompt_feedback: So close to perfect! You've got an amazing cake and decorations — now add some entertainment like music or dancing to make it a FULL party!

birthday party with a giant chocolate ca.narration: A giant chocolate cake arrives as balloons fill the sky and everyone dances!
birthday party with a giant chocolate ca.prompt_feedback: Perfect party plan! Cake, balloons, AND dancing — the monster has never been happier!

cake and balloons.narration: A cake appears with some balloons — not bad, but the monster wants MORE!
cake and balloons.prompt_feedback: Great decorations and food! The monster is smiling — now add some entertainment like music, dancing, or games for a perfect party!

plan a huge birthday celebration with a.narration: The ultimate birthday bash erupts — cake, presents, balloons, and epic dancing!
plan a huge birthday celebration with a.prompt_feedback: WOW! That's the most detailed party plan ever! You thought of everything — the monster is SO happy!

give the monster a party.narration: The monster waits eagerly but the party room is completely empty!
give the monster a party.prompt_feedback: The monster is excited for a party! But what kind of party? Tell the monster about the cake, decorations, and fun activities!

throw a giant cake with balloons.narration: A giant cake soars through the air while balloons float up — almost there!
throw a giant cake with balloons.prompt_feedback: Awesome cake and balloons! Now add something fun to DO at the party — like music, dancing, or games — for a perfect score!

make a party with a big cake lots of bal.narration: The monster wins the dance contest, then faceplants into the giant cake — best party EVER!
make a party with a big cake lots of bal.prompt_feedback: Amazing prompt! You included food (big cake), decorations (balloons), AND entertainment (dance contest) — that's everything a monster party needs! Try adding even more detail next time, like what flavor the cake is or what music plays during the dance contest.

throw the most epic monster party with c.narration: Monster dances on a giant cake while confetti rains and presents fly everywhere — BEST PARTY EVER!
throw the most epic monster party with c.prompt_feedback: Amazing prompt! You included cake (food), presents (decorations), AND games (entertainment) all in one clear sentence. You even added confetti for extra fun — that's how a prompt pro does it!

balloons and presents for the monster.narration: The monster hugs a giant balloon and rips open presents, but keeps asking, 'Where's the cake?'
missing_elements: entertainment or activity (like music, dancing, or games)
balloons and presents for the monster.prompt_feedback: Great job adding decorations AND presents — that's a party starting to take shape! Try also telling the monster about a yummy cake and a fun activity like dancing or games to make the party complete!

play some music and dance.narration: The monster hears music and starts wiggling wildly—but where's the cake and decorations?
play some music and dance.prompt_feedback: Great job adding entertainment—dancing is awesome for a party! Try also describing a yummy cake and some colorful decorations like balloons or presents to make it a complete birthday bash.

hello.narration: The monster waves back shyly but looks around the empty room, wondering where the party is!
hello.prompt_feedback: Great start saying hello! Now try describing the party — tell the monster exactly what you want, like 'Let's have a big cake, colorful balloons, and dance to music!'

pizza.narration: The monster gobbles up a whole pizza in one bite and burps out confetti!
pizza.prompt_feedback: Nice job picking food — every party needs snacks! Try adding more details like decorations and fun activities. For example: 'Let's have pizza with balloons and play a dancing game!'

throw a huge cake with balloons and have.narration: The monster bursts into happy tears as the ultimate birthday bash explodes around him!
throw a huge cake with balloons and have.prompt_feedback: Amazing prompt! You included food, decorations, AND entertainment all in one go. You were super specific with details like balloons, streamers, confetti, and dancing — that's exactly how great prompt engineers do it! Next time, try adding WHO is invited to make the party even more alive!

i want to give the monster the best birt.narration: The monster gets excited and spins around, but 'everything' is so vague nothing actually appears!
i want to give the monster the best birt.prompt_feedback: You're so kind wanting to give the monster the best party! But 'everything' doesn't tell the monster WHAT to prepare. Try listing specific things — like a chocolate cake, colorful balloons, and a dance party!

the monster should get cake and all the.narration: The monster gets a giant cake, balloons everywhere, and dances to the best party music ever!
the monster should get cake and all the.prompt_feedback: Amazing job! You included all three party essentials: food, decorations, AND entertainment. Great prompt! Next time, try being even more specific — like what flavor is the cake, or what kind of music does the monster like? Details make prompts even more powerful!

drive the robot to 123 main street going.narration: Robot zooms down Oak Avenue, swerves around the river, and delivers a perfect pizza to 123 Main Street!
drive the robot to 123 main street going.prompt_feedback: Amazing job! You nailed all three parts: you told the robot WHERE to go (123 Main Street), HOW to get there (Oak Avenue), and WHAT to avoid (the river). Tip: you could make it even better by telling the robot how fast to drive or what to do when it arrives!

take the pizza to the school by going th.narration: Robot zooms through the park, dodges the barking dog, and delivers a perfect pizza to school!
take the pizza to the school by going th.prompt_feedback: Amazing job! You nailed all three parts: WHERE (the school), HOW (through the park), and WHAT TO AVOID (the dog). Your instructions were super clear — the robot knew exactly what to do. Try adding even more detail next time, like how fast the robot should go!

deliver pizza to the kids house go strai.narration: Robot zooms straight, swerves right, dodges puddles and a sneaky squirrel, and delivers hot pizza perfectly!
deliver pizza to the kids house go strai.prompt_feedback: Amazing job! You nailed all three: destination (kid's house), route (straight then right), AND obstacles to dodge (puddles and squirrel). Your instructions were super clear — the robot knew exactly what to do! Next time, try adding extra details like speed or what to do if the path is blocked for bonus fun.

robot go to elm street use the shortcut.narration: Robot zooms past the desk, dodges the river and dog, and delivers hot pizza to Elm Street!
robot go to elm street use the shortcut.prompt_feedback: Amazing job! You told the robot WHERE to go (Elm Street), HOW to get there (shortcut past the desk), AND what to avoid (river and dog). That's a perfect prompt — you're a prompt engineering pro!

deliver the pizza to the house.narration: The robot grabs the pizza and rolls toward the house, but bumps into a few things along the way!
deliver the pizza to the house.prompt_feedback: Nice job telling the robot WHERE to go — a house! Now try adding HOW to get there (like 'go down Main Street') and what to watch out for (like 'avoid the big puddle'). That way the robot won't bump into things!

take the pizza and go right.narration: The robot grabs the pizza and zooms right, but wait—where exactly is it going?
take the pizza and go right.prompt_feedback: Nice job telling the robot to grab the pizza and move! Try adding a specific place to deliver it AND what obstacles to watch out for, like 'avoid the river' or 'watch out for the dog.'

watch out for the river and the dog.narration: The robot dodges the river and the dog, but has no idea where to deliver the pizza!
watch out for the river and the dog.prompt_feedback: Great job telling the robot what obstacles to avoid — that's super important! Now try adding WHERE the pizza should go (like a specific place) and HOW the robot should get there (like which direction to travel).

go to the school with the pizza.narration: Robot zooms toward the school with pizza, but bonks into a fire hydrant it didn't see coming!
missing_elements: obstacle avoidance (what to watch out for)
go to the school with the pizza.prompt_feedback: Nice job telling the robot WHERE to go — the school! Now try adding HOW to get there (like which streets to take) and what obstacles to watch out for (like traffic or puddles).

drive fast to deliver pizza.narration: The robot zooms through the city at top speed, but wait—where is it even going?!
drive fast to deliver pizza.prompt_feedback: Nice job telling the robot HOW to move—fast! But the robot doesn't know WHERE to go or WHAT to watch out for. Try adding a destination like '123 Oak Street' and obstacles to avoid like 'watch out for the river!'

deliver pizza.narration: The robot spins in circles holding the pizza, wondering where on Earth to go!
deliver pizza.prompt_feedback: You told the robot its job — nice start! Now try adding WHERE to deliver (like '123 Oak Street'), HOW to get there (like 'go down Main Road'), and WHAT to watch out for (like 'avoid the big puddle').

go.narration: The robot hears 'go' and spins in circles, totally confused about where to deliver the pizza!
go.prompt_feedback: You gave a quick command — nice energy! But the robot needs more details. Try telling it WHERE to go, WHICH way to travel, and WHAT to watch out for along the way!

pizza time.narration: The robot hears 'pizza time,' spins in circles, and eats the pizza itself. Oops!
pizza time.prompt_feedback: You've got the pizza spirit! Now try telling the robot WHERE to deliver it, HOW to get there, and what obstacles to WATCH OUT for — like 'Robot, take the pizza to the house on the right, go straight down Main Street, and watch out for the river!'

hello robot.narration: The robot waves excitedly but has no idea where to take the pizza! It spins in circles.
hello robot.prompt_feedback: Great job being friendly to the robot! Now try telling it WHERE to deliver the pizza, HOW to get there, and what obstacles to watch out for along the way.

make the robot dance.narration: The robot starts breakdancing in the street and the pizza flies off its head like a frisbee!
make the robot dance.prompt_feedback: Ha, that was funny! But the robot forgot all about the delivery! Try telling the robot WHERE to bring the pizza, WHICH WAY to go, and WHAT to watch out for along the way.

take the pizza to 42 rainbow road go thr.narration: Robot zooms through the park, dodges critters, and delivers a perfect pizza to 42 Rainbow Road!
take the pizza to 42 rainbow road go thr.prompt_feedback: Amazing job! You included the address, the route through the park and past the river, AND obstacles to dodge. That's a perfectly clear prompt — you're a prompt engineering pro! Next time, try adding what to do if something unexpected happens, like a backup plan.

robot deliver pizza to school.narration: The robot zooms toward school with pizza, but bonks into a fire hydrant it didn't see coming!
missing_elements: obstacle avoidance (what to watch out for)
robot deliver pizza to school.prompt_feedback: Nice job naming the destination — the robot knows WHERE to go! Try adding HOW it should get there (like 'go down Main Street') and what to avoid (like 'watch out for puddles and traffic').

cast a freeze spell on the flying plates.narration: The wizard freezes the plates mid-air, corks the soup, silences the toaster, and ropes the fridge shut!
cast a freeze spell on the flying plates.prompt_feedback: Incredible! You fixed ALL four chaos sources with specific solutions — freeze, plug, unplug, and tie. That's a master prompt!

use a levitation spell to catch the plat.narration: Plates float gently down, soup stops overflowing, toaster goes quiet, and the fridge slams shut!
use a levitation spell to catch the plat.prompt_feedback: Amazing! You gave a specific fix for every single chaos source. Levitation for plates, cork for soup, off-switch for toaster, and push for fridge — brilliant!

wave your wand to stop the plates from f.narration: The wizard waves the wand and one by one, every appliance calms down — kitchen saved!
wave your wand to stop the plates from f.prompt_feedback: Perfect! You addressed all four problems with creative magical solutions. Wand-wave, freeze, zap, and lock — the kitchen is saved!

grab the plates with a net spell drain t.narration: A magic net catches the plates, soup drains away, toaster unplugs, and the fridge shrinks to pocket size!
grab the plates with a net spell drain t.prompt_feedback: Wow! Net spell, drain, unplug, AND shrink — four unique solutions for four problems. You think like a real wizard!

stop the flying plates with a spell.narration: The wizard catches the plates, but the soup is overflowing and the toaster is doing the cha-cha!
stop the flying plates with a spell.prompt_feedback: Great start catching those plates! But the soup, toaster, and fridge are still going wild. Try telling the wizard how to fix each one!

freeze the toaster and the fridge.narration: The toaster and fridge freeze solid, but plates crash everywhere and soup floods the floor!
freeze the toaster and the fridge.prompt_feedback: Nice job freezing two appliances! But the plates are still flying and the soup is overflowing. Add solutions for those too!

cast a spell on the soup bowl.narration: The soup stops overflowing, but plates crash into the walls and the toaster moonwalks away!
cast a spell on the soup bowl.prompt_feedback: The soup is handled — great spell! Now try fixing the flying plates, dancing toaster, and rampaging fridge too!

use the fire extinguisher on the toaster.narration: The toaster gets blasted with foam and stops dancing, but the rest of the kitchen is still chaos!
use the fire extinguisher on the toaster.prompt_feedback: Ha! The fire extinguisher worked on the toaster — creative thinking! Now add solutions for the plates, soup, and fridge!

fix the kitchen.narration: The wizard waves vaguely and accidentally makes the plates spin even FASTER!
fix the kitchen.prompt_feedback: The wizard needs more specific instructions! Tell it exactly HOW to fix each thing — the plates, soup, toaster, and fridge.

use magic.narration: The wizard zaps randomly and the soup bowl starts flying too — now there's MORE chaos!
use magic.prompt_feedback: Oops! 'Use magic' is too vague — the spell went wrong! Try describing WHICH spell to use on EACH appliance.

cast a spell.narration: The wizard casts a random spell and the toaster starts singing opera! That didn't help!
cast a spell.prompt_feedback: Which spell? On what? The wizard needs details! Try: 'Cast a freeze spell on the plates, then cork the soup bowl...'

help the wizard.narration: The wizard looks around hopefully but nothing happens — it needs YOUR specific instructions!
help the wizard.prompt_feedback: The wizard WANTS help but needs to know HOW! Describe a plan: what to do about the flying plates, overflowing soup, dancing toaster, and rampaging fridge.

the wizard should wave the wand and fix.narration: One MEGA spell erupts and every appliance freezes in place — the kitchen is finally calm!
the wizard should wave the wand and fix.prompt_feedback: You mentioned ALL four chaos sources — great coverage! Next time, try describing a different fix for each appliance for even more creative prompts.

freeze all the appliances with an ice sp.narration: Ice covers everything — appliances stop, but the frozen soup shatters and plates are stuck to the ceiling!
freeze all the appliances with an ice sp.prompt_feedback: Freezing is a clever idea! But one spell for everything caused side effects. Try giving each appliance its own specific fix!

the trex should use the gym door to get.narration: T-Rex squeezes through the gym door, plops on the floor, grabs a crayon, and opens a GIANT lunchbox!
the trex should use the gym door to get.prompt_feedback: Amazing! You solved ALL four problems: gym door to enter, floor seating, giant crayon to write, and huge lunchbox. Perfect prompt!

open the double doors for trex to walk t.narration: T-Rex struts through double doors, flops on a beanbag, grabs a mega-pencil, and devours a dino-lunch!
open the double doors for trex to walk t.prompt_feedback: Brilliant! Double doors, beanbag chair, taped pencils, and dino-sized lunch — you solved every problem with creative thinking!

break through the wall to enter then sit.narration: T-Rex crashes through the wall, sits by a low desk, paints with a brush, and eats from a bucket!
break through the wall to enter then sit.prompt_feedback: Ha! Breaking through the wall is hilarious AND solves the door problem! You covered entering, sitting, writing, and eating. Great job!

have the trex use the loading dock door.narration: T-Rex waddles in through the loading dock, stacks chairs, carefully grabs a pencil, and rolls in a food wagon!
have the trex use the loading dock door.prompt_feedback: Perfect! Loading dock for entry, stacked chairs for sitting, careful pencil grip, and a wagon of food. Every problem solved!

use the big door to get inside the schoo.narration: T-Rex squeezes through the big door but then stares at the tiny desk, confused!
use the big door to get inside the schoo.prompt_feedback: Great job getting T-Rex inside! But now it needs a place to sit, something to write with, and lunch. What's your plan?

give the trex a big chair to sit on.narration: T-Rex plops on a big chair and it creaks — but how does it get in the building or eat lunch?
give the trex a big chair to sit on.prompt_feedback: Nice chair solution! But T-Rex still needs to get INTO school, grab a writing tool, and eat lunch. Add more details!

get a giant pencil for the dinosaur.narration: T-Rex grabs a giant pencil but accidentally pokes through the desk! Still needs a chair and lunch!
get a giant pencil for the dinosaur.prompt_feedback: A giant pencil — smart! But T-Rex still can't get in the door, has no seat, and is getting hungry. Solve those too!

pack a huge lunch for the trex.narration: A massive lunchbox arrives but T-Rex is stuck outside the tiny school door staring at it!
pack a huge lunch for the trex.prompt_feedback: Great lunch planning! But T-Rex needs to get inside first, find a seat, and grab something to write with. Add those details!

go to school.narration: T-Rex stomps up to the school and gets completely stuck in the tiny doorway!
go to school.prompt_feedback: T-Rex is at school but stuck! It needs YOUR help. How should it get through the door? What about sitting, writing, and eating?

help the dinosaur.narration: T-Rex looks at you hopefully, but without specific instructions it just stomps in circles!
help the dinosaur.prompt_feedback: T-Rex WANTS help but needs to know HOW! Describe solutions for the door, the tiny chair, the small pencil, and lunch.

make it work.narration: T-Rex flexes its tiny arms and tries to pick up a pencil — it shoots across the room!
make it work.prompt_feedback: Make WHAT work? Be specific! Tell T-Rex how to get in the door, where to sit, what to write with, and what to eat.

the trex should try harder.narration: T-Rex tries SO hard it accidentally sits on the desk and crushes it — oops!
the trex should try harder.prompt_feedback: Trying harder without a plan just breaks things! Give T-Rex specific solutions for each problem — door, chair, pencil, and lunch.

the trex needs to solve every single pro.narration: T-Rex charges through the big door, flattens a beanbag, grabs a crayon, and opens a mega-lunchbox!
the trex needs to solve every single pro.prompt_feedback: You listed all four problems! Next time, try describing HOW to solve each one for even more fun. Like: 'Use the gym door, sit on pillows...'

dinosaur should squeeze through the door.narration: T-Rex squeezes through the door and sits on the chair — CRACK! It breaks into pieces!
dinosaur should squeeze through the door.prompt_feedback: You solved the door (sort of!) and tried the chair — but it broke! T-Rex also needs a writing tool and lunch. Try again with solutions for ALL four!

put the dog in a rocket with a spacesuit.narration: The dog blasts off in a rocket, wearing a spacesuit, munching bones, and plants a flag on the moon!
put the dog in a rocket with a spacesuit.prompt_feedback: Perfect mission plan! Rocket for travel, spacesuit for safety, bones for food, and flag-planting as the goal. You're a space commander!

build a spaceship for the dog give it a.narration: The dog zooms to the moon in a spaceship, suited up and snacking, then digs up moon rocks!
build a spaceship for the dog give it a.prompt_feedback: Amazing! Spaceship, helmet and spacesuit, food supplies, AND a moon mission goal. You planned the complete mission — NASA would hire you!

the dog needs a big red rocket a special.narration: A big red rocket launches with a suited-up dog, packed treats, heading to plant a doggy flag on the moon!
the dog needs a big red rocket a special.prompt_feedback: Incredible detail! Red rocket, dog spacesuit, treats AND water, plus a doggy flag goal. Your prompt covered every mission need!

launch the dog in a rocket wearing a spa.narration: The dog rockets to the moon in a spacesuit, lands softly, and digs for moon bones — woof!
launch the dog in a rocket wearing a spa.prompt_feedback: Perfect! Rocket, spacesuit, packed food, AND a fun goal (digging for moon bones!). Creative and complete — you're a mission planning expert!

put the dog in a rocket to the moon.narration: The dog hops in a rocket and zooms toward the moon, but wait — no spacesuit or snacks!
put the dog in a rocket to the moon.prompt_feedback: Great start with the rocket and moon! But the dog needs a spacesuit to stay safe, food for the trip, and a goal when it gets there!

give the dog a spacesuit and a helmet.narration: The dog looks amazing in its spacesuit, but there's no rocket and no food — how will it get to space?
give the dog a spacesuit and a helmet.prompt_feedback: Safety first — great thinking with the spacesuit! Now add a rocket to fly in, food for the trip, and a mission goal like planting a flag!

pack bones and food for the dog trip.narration: Bones and food are packed, but the dog has no rocket or spacesuit — it's just sitting there with snacks!
pack bones and food for the dog trip.prompt_feedback: Packed snacks — the dog loves it! But it needs a rocket to fly, a spacesuit for safety, and a goal for when it reaches the moon!

fly the rocket to the moon.narration: A rocket blasts toward the moon, but the dog inside has no spacesuit and forgot to pack lunch!
fly the rocket to the moon.prompt_feedback: The rocket is flying! But the dog needs a spacesuit for safety, food for the trip, and something to do on the moon. Add those!

go to space.narration: The dog looks up at the sky and barks — but it has no rocket, no suit, and no plan!
go to space.prompt_feedback: The dog wants to go but has nothing ready! Describe the rocket, spacesuit, food to pack, and what to do on the moon.

send the dog up.narration: The dog jumps as high as it can, gets about two feet off the ground, and lands with a confused look!
send the dog up.prompt_feedback: Ha! The dog tried to jump to space! It needs a rocket, a spacesuit, packed food, and a mission goal. Be more specific!

moon.narration: The dog howls at the moon but has absolutely no way to get there!
moon.prompt_feedback: The dog sees the moon but can't reach it! Describe HOW to get there (rocket), what to wear (spacesuit), what to bring (food), and what to DO there.

the dog wants to fly.narration: The dog flaps its ears like wings and spins in a circle — adorable but not going anywhere!
the dog wants to fly.prompt_feedback: Dogs can't fly by flapping their ears! Give the dog a rocket, a spacesuit, pack some bones, and set a goal like planting a flag on the moon.

the dog should get in a rocket with a sp.narration: The ultimate dog mission — rocket launch, moon landing, flag planting, hole digging, and a safe return!
the dog should get in a rocket with a sp.prompt_feedback: WOW! Rocket, spacesuit, snacks, flag, digging, AND coming home safely. That's the most complete space mission plan ever!

launch dog to moon with everything it ne.narration: The dog gets excited but 'everything' is too vague — it packs a tennis ball and nothing else!
launch dog to moon with everything it ne.prompt_feedback: 'Everything' doesn't tell the dog WHAT to pack! List it out: a rocket, a spacesuit, bones and water, and a goal like planting a flag.

the octopus plays guitar and drums on a.narration: The octopus shreds guitar AND drums on a coral stage while fish dance to Ocean Thunder!
the octopus plays guitar and drums on a.prompt_feedback: Amazing! Instruments (guitar + drums), venue (coral reef stage), song name (Ocean Thunder), AND audience (fish). Rock on!

set up a big underwater stage with guita.narration: A massive underwater stage lights up as the octopus jams guitar, keyboard, and drums for a fishy crowd!
set up a big underwater stage with guita.prompt_feedback: Perfect! Three instruments, an underwater stage, a pop song, and a sea creature audience. You planned the ultimate underwater concert!

octopus grabs guitar drums keyboard and.narration: The octopus grabs ALL the instruments, belts out 'Deep Sea Rock' on a coral stage for cheering fish!
octopus grabs guitar drums keyboard and.prompt_feedback: WOW! Four instruments, coral stage, song name 'Deep Sea Rock', and fish audience. That's the most detailed band setup ever!

the octopus uses four arms for guitar dr.narration: Four arms play four instruments on a shipwreck stage as fish fans go wild for Bubble Rock!
the octopus uses four arms for guitar dr.prompt_feedback: Creative genius! Using four arms for four instruments is SO clever. Shipwreck stage, 'Bubble Rock' song, and fish fans — perfect concert!

the octopus plays guitar.narration: The octopus strums a guitar alone in the dark ocean — where's the stage and audience?
the octopus plays guitar.prompt_feedback: The octopus has 8 arms — it can play MORE instruments! Add a stage, pick a song, and invite some fish to watch!

play drums and guitar underwater.narration: The octopus rocks drums and guitar, but bubbles muffle the sound — no stage, no audience!
play drums and guitar underwater.prompt_feedback: Two instruments — the octopus is rocking! Now set up a stage, pick a song name, and invite fish to be the audience!

set up a stage for the octopus.narration: A beautiful coral stage appears, but the octopus has no instruments and nobody came to watch!
set up a stage for the octopus.prompt_feedback: Great stage! But a band needs instruments (guitar, drums, keyboard), a song to play, and an audience. Add those!

the fish come to watch the octopus.narration: Fish swim in excitedly, but the octopus has no instruments and there's no stage — awkward!
the fish come to watch the octopus.prompt_feedback: The fish are here — great audience! Now give the octopus instruments, set up a stage, and pick a song to play!

play music.narration: The octopus waves its arms around but there are no instruments — it's just splashing water!
play music.prompt_feedback: Play music with what? The octopus needs instruments (guitar, drums, keyboard), a stage, a song, and an audience of fish!

start a band.narration: The octopus raises all eight arms and waits — a band needs more than enthusiasm!
start a band.prompt_feedback: Great idea, but HOW? Tell the octopus which instruments to play, where to perform, what song to sing, and who should watch!

the octopus wants to rock.narration: The octopus air-guitars with all eight arms but there's no actual guitar — or anything else!
the octopus wants to rock.prompt_feedback: The octopus has the spirit! Now give it real instruments, a stage to perform on, a song to play, and invite fish to watch!

music time.narration: The octopus taps its tentacles on a rock and looks around — is this a concert or not?
music time.prompt_feedback: Music time needs a plan! Which instruments should the octopus play? Where's the stage? What's the song? Who's listening?

the octopus should play every instrument.narration: The octopus plays EVERY instrument on a mega coral stage as thousands of fish dance to Bubble Pop!
the octopus should play every instrument.prompt_feedback: EPIC! Every instrument, huge coral stage, Bubble Pop music, and all the fish dancing. That's the most incredible underwater concert ever planned!

octopus band with guitar singing for fis.narration: The octopus strums guitar and sings for a few fish, but needs more instruments and a real stage!
octopus band with guitar singing for fis.prompt_feedback: Good start with guitar, singing, and fish! A band needs more instruments (drums? keyboard?), a stage, and a song name. Add those!

skeleton throws a birthday party with ca.narration: Skeleton lights candles on the birthday cake as presents stack high and banners wave!
skeleton throws a birthday party with ca.prompt_feedback: Perfect party plan! You included cake, presents, AND decorations — skeleton is so happy!

make a surprise party with cake gifts an.narration: Skeletons jump out yelling surprise as cake, gifts, and colorful banners appear!
make a surprise party with cake gifts an.prompt_feedback: Amazing! You remembered food, gifts, AND decorations — that's a complete surprise party!

skeleton wants cake and presents.narration: A birthday cake and presents arrive, but where are the decorations?
skeleton wants cake and presents.prompt_feedback: Good start! You have cake and presents, but try adding banners or balloons next time!

put a cake on the table.narration: A cake appears on the table, but this party needs more!
put a cake on the table.prompt_feedback: That's a start! Now think about gifts and colorful decorations to complete the party.

give skeleton some cupcakes.narration: Delicious cupcakes appear, but where are the presents and party decorations?
give skeleton some cupcakes.prompt_feedback: Sweet treats are great! Don't forget presents and banners for a complete birthday party.

skeleton eats pizza.narration: Pizza arrives, but skeletons prefer birthday cake for parties!
skeleton eats pizza.prompt_feedback: Ha! Skeletons love pizza, but birthdays need cake! Try again with party foods.

skeleton dances in the dungeon.narration: Skeleton does a silly dance, but where's the party stuff?
skeleton dances in the dungeon.prompt_feedback: Dancing is fun, but parties need cake, presents, and decorations too!

make it rain barrels.narration: Barrels fall from the sky — silly but not much of a birthday party!
make it rain barrels.prompt_feedback: Haha! Barrels are funny but not for birthdays. Think cake, gifts, and banners!

surprise party time.narration: Adventurers jump out with cake and presents while banners wave everywhere!
surprise party time.prompt_feedback: SURPRISE! You nailed it with helpers, cake, presents, and decorations!

skeleton gets the best birthday ever.narration: The dungeon transforms into party central with cake, gifts, and cheerful skeletons!
skeleton gets the best birthday ever.prompt_feedback: The BEST birthday! You thought of everything — cake, presents, and decorations!

knight goes on space mission with spaces.narration: Knight and Space Ranger blast off with high-tech gear from the space base!
knight goes on space mission with spaces.prompt_feedback: Mission ready! You included equipment, a helper, AND a vehicle — perfect team!

send knight to space with ranger and spa.narration: Knight explores the space base with Space Ranger as modules connect!
send knight to space with ranger and spa.prompt_feedback: Stellar job! You brought equipment, a helper, and base modules for a real mission!

knight needs space equipment.narration: Space equipment appears, but where's the ranger to help?
knight needs space equipment.prompt_feedback: Good thinking! You have equipment, but space missions need a partner like Space Ranger.

put knight in a space dome.narration: Knight stands under the space dome, but needs more mission gear!
put knight in a space dome.prompt_feedback: You've got shelter! Now add equipment and a space ranger to complete the mission.

space ranger waves at knight.narration: Space Ranger waves hello, but they need equipment and a base!
space ranger waves at knight.prompt_feedback: Great teamwork! Now give them space equipment and a base to work from.

knight fights aliens.narration: Knight swings a sword in space, but there are no aliens here!
knight fights aliens.prompt_feedback: Ha! This is an exploration mission, not a battle. Think equipment and teammates!

make the knight jump around.narration: Knight bounces in zero gravity — fun but not very productive!
make the knight jump around.prompt_feedback: Bouncing is fun! But missions need equipment, helpers, and a base to succeed.

knight eats pizza in space.narration: Pizza floats by in zero gravity — silly snack time!
knight eats pizza in space.prompt_feedback: Haha! Space pizza is silly. Focus on mission equipment and your space ranger buddy.

blast off to the stars.narration: Knight and Space Ranger prepare the garage module and cargo for liftoff!
blast off to the stars.prompt_feedback: Mission accomplished! Equipment, teammate, and launch vehicle — you're ready for space!

space mission with friend and tools.narration: Knight and Ranger set up base modules with solar panels for energy!
space mission with friend and tools.prompt_feedback: Perfect planning! Helper, equipment, and base modules — that's a real space mission!

mage cooks with magic spells food and ki.narration: Mage waves her wand as pots bubble, ovens glow, and magical pies appear!
mage cooks with magic spells food and ki.prompt_feedback: Magical cooking! You used spells, tools, AND made delicious food — perfect combo!

witch helps mage cook magical food with.narration: Witch and Mage team up to bake cake and bread in the enchanted oven!
witch helps mage cook magical food with.prompt_feedback: Teamwork makes the dream work! Helpers, tools, and magic — the kitchen is amazing!

mage uses magic to cook.narration: Mage casts spells, but where are the cooking tools and ingredients?
mage uses magic to cook.prompt_feedback: Magic is great! But kitchens need tools like ovens and food ingredients too.

put a pan on the stove.narration: Pan sits on the stove, but magic and food are missing!
put a pan on the stove.prompt_feedback: Good start with tools! Now add some magic spells and yummy food.

witch chops vegetables.narration: Witch chops ingredients, but needs magic and more kitchen gear!
witch chops vegetables.prompt_feedback: Nice chopping! Don't forget to add magical spells and cooking equipment.

mage summons a skeleton.narration: A skeleton pops up in the kitchen — not very helpful for cooking!
mage summons a skeleton.prompt_feedback: Haha! Skeletons are fun but can't cook. Try summoning food instead!

make the kitchen explode.narration: Magic goes wrong and everything explodes — uh oh!
make the kitchen explode.prompt_feedback: Whoops! Too much magic. Try gentle spells with proper tools and ingredients.

mage runs around the kitchen.narration: Mage sprints in circles — not much cooking happening!
mage runs around the kitchen.prompt_feedback: Slow down! Cooking needs magic spells, tools, and ingredients — not running!

magical feast time.narration: Mage and Witch create a feast with pies, cakes, and bread using enchanted tools!
magical feast time.prompt_feedback: WOW! Magic, helpers, tools, and amazing food — you're a master chef wizard!

cook with teamwork and magic.narration: Witch stirs the pot while Mage enchants the stove to make chocolate cake!
cook with teamwork and magic.prompt_feedback: Perfect recipe! Helpers, magic, tools, and tasty treats — the kitchen is enchanted!

barbarian goes to school with books desk.narration: Barbarian sits at a desk with stacked books while friends cheer from the playground!
barbarian goes to school with books desk.prompt_feedback: A+ work! You brought school supplies, furniture, AND friends — perfect school day!

send barbarian to school with all advent.narration: All five adventurers gather at the playground with slides and seesaws for recess!
send barbarian to school with all advent.prompt_feedback: School's awesome! You included classmates, play equipment, AND school stuff — best day ever!

barbarian brings books to school.narration: Barbarian carries books, but where are the friends and classroom?
barbarian brings books to school.prompt_feedback: Books are important! Now add friends to study with and a desk to sit at.

put barbarian on playground.narration: Barbarian plays on the slide, but school needs books and friends too!
put barbarian on playground.prompt_feedback: Recess is fun! But don't forget school supplies and classmates to learn with.

knight waves at barbarian.narration: Knight says hi to Barbarian, but where's the school stuff?
knight waves at barbarian.prompt_feedback: Friendship is great! Now add books and desks to make it a real school.

barbarian fights everyone.narration: Barbarian swings an axe wildly — not how we behave at school!
barbarian fights everyone.prompt_feedback: Whoa! School is for learning, not fighting. Try books and friendly classmates instead!

make barbarian do pushups.narration: Barbarian does pushups — great exercise but this is school time!
make barbarian do pushups.prompt_feedback: Strong muscles! But school needs books, friends, and desks for learning.

barbarian slides down the seesaw.narration: Barbarian uses the seesaw backwards — hilarious but confused!
barbarian slides down the seesaw.prompt_feedback: Ha! Seesaws need two people. Bring friends, books, and a desk for school!

learning day at school.narration: Barbarian reads books at a desk while Ranger and Rogue play on the merry-go-round!
learning day at school.prompt_feedback: Perfect school day! Learning time, friends, and play equipment — you thought of everything!

school with all the friends.narration: All adventurers gather with books, chairs, and sandbox fun — best class ever!
school with all the friends.prompt_feedback: Outstanding! Supplies, classmates, and fun equipment — that's a complete school experience!

throw a rock concert in the dungeon with.narration: Adventurers and skeletons jam out as torches flicker and banners wave!
throw a rock concert in the dungeon with.prompt_feedback: Rock on! You brought performers, instruments, AND decorations — that's a real concert!

skeleton band plays music with adventure.narration: Skeletons taunt rhythmically while Barbarian hammers drums under glowing torches!
skeleton band plays music with adventure.prompt_feedback: Epic show! Band members, music actions, and atmosphere — you're a concert master!

skeletons play music.narration: Skeletons dance around, but where are the other musicians and decorations?
skeletons play music.prompt_feedback: Good start! Now add more band members and dungeon decorations for a full concert.

put torches in the dungeon.narration: Torches light up the dungeon, but the concert needs musicians!
put torches in the dungeon.prompt_feedback: Great atmosphere! Now bring in adventurers and skeletons to perform the music.

knight and barbarian cheer.narration: Adventurers cheer loudly, but who's playing the music?
knight and barbarian cheer.prompt_feedback: Awesome energy! But concerts need performers making music and cool decorations.

skeleton attacks everyone.narration: Skeleton charges aggressively — this is a concert, not a battle!
skeleton attacks everyone.prompt_feedback: Whoa! Concerts are for music, not fighting. Try performers and instruments instead!

clown jumps around.narration: Clown bounces everywhere — entertaining but where's the band?
clown jumps around.prompt_feedback: Fun clowning! But rock concerts need musicians with instruments and decorations.

everyone sits on barrels.narration: Adventurers sit on barrels waiting — someone needs to start the show!
everyone sits on barrels.prompt_feedback: They're waiting! Give them performers, music-making actions, and cool decorations.

dungeon rock festival.narration: All adventurers and skeletons perform together under banners and torchlight — legendary!
dungeon rock festival.prompt_feedback: LEGENDARY SHOW! Full band, magical performance, and atmosphere — you're a rockstar!

best concert ever.narration: Barbarian hammers, Knight spins, and Skeleton taunts while torches and banners fill the dungeon!
best concert ever.prompt_feedback: ENCORE! Perfect performers, action-packed music, and decorations — the crowd goes wild!

skeleton delivers pizza to knight and ra.narration: Skeleton Warrior carries hot pepperoni pizza to Knight and Ranger at the table!
skeleton delivers pizza to knight and ra.prompt_feedback: Perfect delivery! Pizza, customers, AND dining setup — you're a delivery champion!

skeleton brings pepperoni pizza and chee.narration: Skeleton Rogue sneaks over with two pizzas as Ranger and Knight cheer at their table!
skeleton brings pepperoni pizza and chee.prompt_feedback: Double delivery! Food, happy customers, and dining area — excellent service!

skeleton carries pizza.narration: Skeleton holds a pizza, but who's going to eat it?
skeleton carries pizza.prompt_feedback: Good job getting the pizza! Now find customers and a place for them to eat.

put pizza on table.narration: Pizza sits on the table, but where are the hungry customers?
put pizza on table.prompt_feedback: Table's ready! But deliveries need customers to serve the pizza to.

knight waves at skeleton.narration: Knight waves hello, but where's the pizza delivery?
knight waves at skeleton.prompt_feedback: Friendly service! Now bring the pizza and a table for them to enjoy it.

skeleton throws pizza at people.narration: Skeleton tosses pizza like a frisbee — messy and silly!
skeleton throws pizza at people.prompt_feedback: Ha! Pizza is for eating, not throwing. Try a nice delivery to hungry customers.

skeleton runs away.narration: Skeleton sprints off without the pizza — worst delivery ever!
skeleton runs away.prompt_feedback: Come back! Deliveries need pizza, customers, and a place to dine!

skeleton fights knight.narration: Skeleton attacks the customer — that's not how delivery works!
skeleton fights knight.prompt_feedback: Yikes! Be friendly and bring pizza to hungry customers at a nice table.

pizza party delivery.narration: Skeleton delivers both pizzas as Knight and Ranger sit with plates at the restaurant table!
pizza party delivery.prompt_feedback: AMAZING! Pizza, happy diners, and restaurant setup — five-star delivery service!

skeleton brings dinner.narration: Skeleton Rogue sneaks pepperoni pizza to Ranger sitting on a bench with a plate!
skeleton brings dinner.prompt_feedback: Stealthy delivery! Food, customer, and dining spot — you're a pizza delivery ninja!

adventurers have picnic with blanket bas.narration: All five adventurers gather on the blanket with basket, sandwiches, and tea under a big tree!
adventurers have picnic with blanket bas.prompt_feedback: Perfect picnic! Food, friends, picnic gear, AND beautiful nature — you thought of everything!

knight barbarian mage ranger and rogue p.narration: All adventurers sit together eating cake and pie by the fountain with trees!
knight barbarian mage ranger and rogue p.prompt_feedback: Best picnic ever! All friends, yummy food, setup, and nature scenery — amazing!

put food on picnic blanket.narration: Sandwiches sit on the blanket, but where are the friends and nature?
put food on picnic blanket.prompt_feedback: Good picnic setup! Now invite friends and find a pretty outdoor spot with trees.

knight and barbarian sit together.narration: Two friends sit down, but where's the picnic food and outdoor scenery?
knight and barbarian sit together.prompt_feedback: Nice friendship! But picnics need food on a blanket and trees or fountains nearby.

mage picks up basket.narration: Mage grabs the picnic basket, but needs friends and a nice outdoor spot!
mage picks up basket.prompt_feedback: Good start! Now bring friends, spread out food, and find a pretty park setting.

ranger throws rocks.narration: Ranger tosses rocks around — not very peaceful for a picnic!
ranger throws rocks.prompt_feedback: Ha! Picnics are calm. Try food, friends, blankets, and pretty nature spots!

knight fights with sword.narration: Knight swings a sword wildly — picnics are for relaxing, not battling!
knight fights with sword.prompt_feedback: Whoa! Picnics are peaceful. Bring friends, food, and enjoy nature together!

mage casts magic spells.narration: Mage shoots magic everywhere — save spells for later, it's picnic time!
mage casts magic spells.prompt_feedback: Cool magic! But picnics need food, friends, blankets, and beautiful nature.

perfect park picnic.narration: All five adventurers relax on blankets with pie, tea, and sandwiches by the fountain!
perfect park picnic.prompt_feedback: PERFECT DAY! Friends, food, picnic setup, and lovely nature — you're a picnic pro!

friends enjoy nature feast.narration: Rogue, Knight, and Mage share cake and apples under a big tree near the bushes!
friends enjoy nature feast.prompt_feedback: Wonderful picnic! Friends together, delicious food, gear, and nature — you nailed it!
